personalInfo.education: University of North Carolina-Charlotte (2009, Business Administration-Management)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 66th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Registered three wins on the eGolf Tour and Carolinas Pro Golf Tour. 2012: Made the cut in nine of 13 eGolf Professional Tour events. His best finish came at the Cabarrus Classic, where he was T2. Fired an opening-round 65 at The HGM Hotels Classic at Rock Barn and finished the tournament in third place. Ended the year with five top 10s.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2007 Ping Preview and the 2007 Pacific Invitational...Won the 2007 Luxembourg Amateur. Was named the 2007 Golf World National Player of the Mid-Year...Named to the Atlantic-10 All-Academic Team...Was a member of the German men's national team...Won the 2005 Collegiate Players Tour event at Walt Disney World (68-72-70) by two strokes...Led team to first place at the 2002 German Team Championship and was 10th at the European Boys Team Championship.
tourBios.personal: His mother played for the Caech Republic national handball team...His high school in Germany did not have a golf team...Twitter account is @stefangoespga...If he did not play golf, says he would want to be a professional soccer player...Favorite golf memory is his first golf shot he hit in 1995...Favorite food is his sister's pasta...Dream foursome would include his mom, Ben Hogan and Warren Buffet...Not many people know he loves to cook.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T61st in 2013 at the BMW Charity Pro-Am Presented by SYNNEX Corporation.
